title: Looking for ADC, Mid, and Top for Sunday Clash - Tier IV
body:
Looking for some chill humans to play clash with tonight. Shoot me a message/add me if any of these roles are a fit for you.

add: RevolvingElk

replies.body: Top lane Ornn, if interested add Pls Ban Jax or Dodo#5291 on discord

I am an ADC main

Draven, Cait, Vayne, Luc

my ingame name is fowell
can fill for either of these roles. but more comfortable mid/top, have sent you a friend request
